title: Kinetics&Reactor Dsgn
description: Reacting systems are analyzed in terms of reaction mechanisms, kinetics, and reactor design.  Both homogeneous and heterogeneous reactions are considered.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHBE 3130 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and CHBE 3200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and CHBE 3210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
